tool_description: This API is mainly designed for Blue collar/ White collar/ Grey collar jobs where it's converting profession names, organization names & addresses, person names and addresses, anything related to the Blue-collar jobs and Employment.
name: Transliteration for Employment in Indian Languages
title: Transliteration for Employment in Indian Languages
tool_name: Transliteration for Employment in Indian Languages

api_list.name: transliteration
api_list.description: Converts the content related to Employment like company name, address, profession name etc.  into Indian Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-employment-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-employment-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-employment-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-employment-in-indian-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
